hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc export WORKSPACE=`pwd` # Install packages sudo yum install -y git wget tar java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel
# Set the variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin java -version
# Download Apache Maven 3.3.9& set the variables wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.3.9/binaries/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz tar -xf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz
export PATH=$WORKSPACE/apache-maven-3.3.9/bin:$PATH export PATH=$PATH:$WORKSPACE/wildfly/build/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx1024m" export JBOSS_HOME=$WORKSPACE/wildfly/build/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final
# Build the Source
cd $WORKSPACE git clone https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly.git cd wildfly git checkout 12.0.0.Final mvn install
#Verification # Start server in stand alone mode nohup sh ./dist/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin/standalone.sh -b 0.0.0.0 -bmanagement 0.0.0.0 & sleep 120s curl http://127.0.0.1:8080 sleep 60s
pgrep -d" " -f "wildfly" | sudo xargs kill ||true
sleep 20s # Start server in domain mode nohup sh ./dist/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin/domain.sh -b 0.0.0.0 -bmanagement 0.0.0.0 & sleep 60s
sleep 60s # Check server response curl http://127.0.0.1:8080 pgrep -d" " -f "wildfly" | sudo xargs kill ||true
